remarks: Right identity of natural transformations.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fuclid.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fuclid.n $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
fuclid.x $e |- .xb = ( comp ` Q ) $.
fuclid.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
fuclid.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F N G ) ) $.
fucrid $p |- ( ph -> ( R ( <. F , F >. .xb G ) ( .1. o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ) = R ) $.
